Dana Desa Tahap III di Pandeglang Belum Bisa Dicairkan
07 Nov 2019, 10:58 by Dendy Fachreinsyah


Dana Desa Tahap III di Pandeglang Belum Bisa Dicairkan

KBRN, Pandeglang : Pencairan Dana Desa (DD) tahap III di Kabupaten Pandeglang, belum bisa direalisasikan. Pasalnya, masih banyak desa yang belum menyerahkan usulan pengajuan pencairan DD tahap III.Dinas Pemberdayaan Masyarakat dan Pemerintahan Desa (DPMPD) Kabupaten Pandeglang membeberkan, saat ini baru 60 desa yang mengajukan pencairan DD tahap III. Sisanya dari 326 desa se-Kabupaten Pandeglang, belum menyerahkan proposal pengajuan pencairan DD.Kasi Pengendali Keuangan Desa pada DPMPD Pandeglang, Ahmad Mubarok menerangkan, pihaknya sudah mengingatkan para Kepala Desa (Kades) untuk segera menyetorkan pengajuan pencairan. Sebab pemerintah tidak ingin proses pencairan kembali dilakukan pada detik-detik akhir batas pencairan. Soalnya, hal itu akan meyulitkan desa dalam menyusun laporan pertanggung jawaban."Tahap ketiga ini, kami harapankan lebih cepat lebih baik karena kami juga tidak mau lagi pencairan di injury time terulang," ujarnya, Kamis (7/11/2019).Ahmad menjelaskan, setiap desa diberi tenggat hingga akhir November untuk mengusulkan pencairan DD tahap III. Terlebih saat ini, Dana Desa tahap III sudah ditransfer dari Rekening Kas Umum Negara (RKUN) menuju Rekening Kas Umum Daerah (RKUD). "Progres pengajuan untuk tahap III sekarang ini, kurang lebih sudah ada 60 desa yang sudah masuk pengajuannya. Karena memang uang sudah ditransfer dari Rekening Kas Umum Negara (RKUN) ke RKUD. Jadi kalau proposal sudah masuk, nanti dari RKUD ditransfer ke rekening kas desa," katanya.Adapun hingga tahap II kemarin, pemerintah sudah menggelontorkan DD sekitar Rp180 miliar. Tahun 2019, Kabupaten Pandeglang mendapat jatah DD sebesar Rp261 miliar. "Rata-rata setiap desa menerima Dana Desa antara Rp700 juta hingga Rp1,2 miliar," sebut Ahmad.

Phase III Village Funds in Pandeglang Cannot Be Disbursed yet
Nov 7 2019, 10:58 by Dendy Fachreinsyah


Phase III Village Funds in Pandeglang Cannot Be Disbursed yet

KBRN, Pandeglang: Phase III Village Fund Disbursement (DD) in Pandeglang Regency has not yet been realized. Because, there are still many villages that have not submitted proposals for stage III DD disbursement. The Community Empowerment and Village Administration (DPMPD) Pandeglang Regency revealed, currently only 60 villages have submitted stage III DD disbursement. The rest of the 326 villages in Pandeglang Regency, have not submitted proposals for DD disbursement. The Village Finance Control Head of Pandeglang DPMPD, Ahmad Mubarok explained, his party had reminded the Village Heads (Kades) to immediately deposit the submission for disbursement. Because the government does not want the disbursement process to be carried out again at the final seconds of the disbursement limit. The problem is, it will make it difficult for the village in preparing the accountability report. "This third stage, we hope the sooner the better because we also no longer want the disbursement in injury time to repeat," he said, Thursday (11/07/2019). Ahmad explained , each village was given a deadline until the end of November to propose the disbursement of DD stage III. Especially at this time, the Phase III Village Fund has been transferred from the State General Cash Account (RKUN) to the Regional General Cash Account (RKUD). "The progress of submission for phase III is now, more or less 60 villages have already entered the submission. Because the money has indeed been transferred from the State General Treasury Account (RKUN) to the RKUD. So if the proposal has been submitted, then from the RKUD it will be transferred to the village cash account , "he said. As for the second phase yesterday, the government had poured DD of around Rp180 billion. In 2019, Pandeglang Regency received a DD ration of Rp261 billion. "On average each village receives a Village Fund of between IDR 700 million to IDR 1.2 billion," said Ahmad.
